phone.title: What is your phone number

studentInfo.description: The personal information on your student ID must be accurate as it will be used to match with others on Budyya!

universitySelect.title: What university are you enrolled in?
universitySelect.description: Choose your university and meet your campus buddies
universitySelect.label: University

studentType.title: Which of these apply to you?

gender.title: What is your gender?
gender.description: Your gender will be shown on your profile and will be used in the matching process.
gender.genderDescription:
You don’t have to share your gender.
But in that case, you’ll only be matched with buddies open to all genders.
gender.label: Gender

name.title: What is your name?
name.description:
To make it easier for buddies to remember,
we recommend using an English name.
name.label: Nickname

name.warning: Please enter your name in English

country.description: Choose your nationality and meet buddies from around the world.

language.description: Choose available languages and find buddies who speak your preferred language.

major.title: What are you studying in university?

major.maxSelect: You can choose up to {{count}} majors

interest.title: What are your interests?
interest.description: Choose your interest and match with buddies with same interests

userGuide.title: Community Guidelines
userGuide.description: Our community is a space where we respect each other. Please review the following guidelines.
userGuide.guideline1: Please use English so more buddies can connect and understand each other easily.
userGuide.guideline2: Avoiding someone just because of gender or nationality can hurt them. Let’s build a respectful and welcoming space together.
userGuide.guideline3: Buddyya is a space for students from your own campus. The buddy you meet might be in the class right next to yours. Let’s connect with care and respect.
userGuide.guideline4: Racist or discriminatory remarks are not tolerated
userGuide.terms:
By tapping “Start Buddyya,”
You agree to our <termsLink>Terms of service.</termsLink>
userGuide.checkboxText: I agree to the community guidelines
